name: Unearth
description:
Experience the final recovery mission of the AI that would come to be known as the Oversoul.



Recover the relics of the All-Makers from the underground colony while escorting the loyal conservators to safety.



Dig your way down through 49 levels of explosive puzzles while recovering upgrades for yourself.

Now available at all Babbages & EB Games locations!

Original system requirements:

System 7.1 or higher
2mb of RAM (Virtual Memory ok)
2mb free hard disk space
1.44mb floppy drive required
B&W Monitor capable of 512 × 342 resolution or higher
